Source.Name: xmlsec1
Source.Summary: Library providing support for "XML Signature" and "XML Encryption" standards
Source.Description: XML Security Library is a C library based on LibXML2 and OpenSSL. The library was created with a goal to support major XML security standards "XML Digital Signature" and "XML Encryption".

Package.Name: xmlsec1

Package.Description: XML Security Library is a C library based on LibXML2 and OpenSSL. The library was created with a goal to support major XML security standards "XML Digital Signature" and "XML Encryption".
